examples.example: 在这个团队中，少数人的创新想法往往能带来意想不到的惊喜。

translate.english: In this team, the innovative ideas of a few people can often bring unexpected surprises.

examples.example: 尽管是少数人先发起了这项公益活动，但最终带动了很多人参与进来。

translate.english: Although a small number of people initiated this public welfare activity first, it eventually drove many people to participate.

examples.example: 尽管只是少数人做出了努力，但却推动了整个项目的进展。

translate.english: Although only a few people made efforts, it promoted the progress of the entire project.
